member.name: M:TravelClock.AnalogueClock.SetTime(System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Set the time to be displayed by the clock control. This also redraws the clock.
member.param: A Date object with target time

member.name: P:TravelClock.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TravelClock.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
